summary:
Replace shrouded cowls with monk hood.
Better for archers.
Now you can choose from two version!!!
descriptionHtml:
---INFO---
This is replace of shrouded cowl with monk hood for male and female.

---Recommendation---
Deacons Dark Brotherhood Pack 
Link: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12450

---FUTURE PLANS---
Make better meshes and textures.
Add beast races support

---Changelog---
0.1 - Initial Release
0.2 - Added male version
0.3 - Two version of masked hood for females
       New textures for male hood

---CREDITS---
Bethesda for make the best game on the world
Psychosteve  for make monk hood with dragon priest mask and textures and helping with             creating another mesh
calyps for make open dragon priest mask
Nexus for make the best mod databaze

---MY MODS---
TJF Shrouded Armor (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23306)
TJF Staff of Magnus (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24275)
TJF Steel Quiver (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24277)
author: TheJamesFreeze
